entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:06 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
